name: align-sequences
title: Align Sequences (Primer Alignment)
description: Align short sequences (primers) to a longer target sequence allowing for one mismatch
content:
Overview

This application aligns short DNA sequences (such as primers) to a longer target sequence, checking both forward and reverse complement strands. Allows up to one mismatch.

Features

  • Checks forward and reverse complement
  • Allows up to one mismatch
  • Reports all alignment positions
  • Identifies mismatch locations

Parameters

  • Target Sequence: Long DNA sequence to search
  • Short Sequences: Space-separated primer sequences to align

Output

Returns a JSON file with alignment positions, strands, and mismatches for each primer.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/align_sequences.py "${longSeq}" ${shortSeqs} -o "${outputDir}"
